body.name: KOLLIEE Armless Home Office Chair Mesh Ergonomic Small Swivel Computer Desk Chair No Arms Black Back Support Task Chair for Kids and Adults
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 5 hrs 8 mins
features: 360° SWIVEL, HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE OFFICE CHAIR: 360° swivel seat cushion and wheels, meet various needs during use. Overall Height: 33.1 inch-37.8 inch； Adjustable Seat Height: 17 inch-21.7 inch (seat to the floor).

ERGONOMIC MESH OFFICE CHAIR: Ergonomic back support helps to relieve back strain, high density mesh covers backrest and cushion to keep you cool, high elasticity foam cushion makes you feel comfortable when sitting for a long time.

ARMLESS OFFICE CHAIR, EASY TO ASSEMBLE: No arms, space saving, slide into the desk without any difficulty, no restriction brought by armrest. Simple assembly design, with assembly instructions and video, can be completed in 10-15 minutes by yourself.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: With High resilience sponge cushion, hard-wearing and high breathable nylon mesh, high-quality gas cylinder, sturdy five-star base, wear-resistant solid wheels, this professional computer chair bring you good quality assurance.
MULTI-SCENARIO APPLICATION: Comfortable desk chair for office, meeting room, home, student dorm and other occasions, provides a better sitting experience for your daily use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KOLLIEE Mesh Office Chair, Enjoys the Comfortable and Relaxed Office Experience.

SUPPORTS UP TO 250LBS Our office chair is made of high-quality materials, durable and comfortable, bearing up to 250 pounds, which can meet the needs of most people. ARMLESS OFFICE CHAIR DIMENSIONS All dimensions are measured manually, these may have deviation range around 1 inch. If by any chance they are not the same as your measure, we are sorry for that. Overall Height (top to floor): 33.1"- 37.8" (84cm-96cm) Chair Back Size: 16.1"W x 14.6''H (41 x 37 cm) Height From Chair Top to Cushion: 17.3" (44 cm) Seat Size: 18.1"W x 17.5"D (46 x 44.5 cm) Seat Thickness: 2.2" (5.5 cm) Seat Height (seat to floor): 17" - 21.7" (43-55 cm) Adjustable Height: 4.7" (12 cm) Base Diameter: 25.2'' (64cm)

ERGONOMIC LUMBAR DESIGN, GOOD LUMBAR SUPPORT -SPECIAL Y-SHAPED BACKREST DESIGN: Provides lower-back support, relieves back pain. -ERGONOMIC LUMBAR SUPPORT: Offers good lumbar support, reduces back pressure.

HIGH DENSITY MESH & HIGH RESILIENCE FOAM CUSHION HIGH DENSITY MESH: American-made mesh, non-deformable, breathable, wear-resistant. Black mesh covers seat and the chair back to keep you cool during use. HIGH RESILIENCE FOAM CUSHION: Comfortable, breathable, not easy to deform, good support offered.

HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE OFFICE CHAIR Adjustable Height: about 4.7 inch (12 cm) Simple operation, just press the "button" under the seat to adjust the seat height as needed. SUPERIOR QUALITY GAS LIFT CYLINDER Load-bearing 250 LBS Our gas lift cylinder chosen high quality material, more durable and safe, with great bearing capacity and long service lift. 360° SWIVEL DESIGN The chair is designed with 360-degree rotation, more flexible, free and convenient, brings you a brand-new office experience.360° swivel flexible casters, move smoothly and noiselessly, and will not scratch and dirty the floor.

OFFICE CHAIR WITHOUT ARMREST, SPACE SAVING ARMLESS DESIGN, SAVING SPACE: This armless office chair is in the perfect size that can slide under the desk when not in use, saving spaces and making your office or room more spacious and tidy.OFFICE CHAIR WITHOUT ARMREST: No limits, no narrows, no uncomfortable causing by armrests, friendly to child and adults.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE Our armless office chair offers all the parts, necessary tools and instructions manual, so it is effortless to assemble the chair according to the instructions.We also provide the assembly video on the product page. You can complete this desk chair independently within 15 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Assembly Required (less than 30 minutes)
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t looking for an item that I would have to assemble, but the instructions were easy and all assembly products were provided. The chair cushion is sooo comfortable. The chair makes me want to do homework.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the chair!
reviews.reviewText: The chair is just as described. Love the chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value office chair for occasional use
reviews.reviewText: I needed an office chair without arms so that I could play guitar at my desk. This one fit the bill and was priced right.Assembly is pretty easy. The hardest part is the first step, assembling the base. You put it together upside-down. Make sure the legs are oriented properly. It doesn’t require as much force as it might seem. You just have to wiggle each leg into position until it seats enough that you can fold it down. Folding will snug them into place. After that, it’s only a matter of pressing in the wheels, 3 socket head bolts for the back rest, and 4 under the seat. It’s nice that there is a cover to pop on the back that hides the bolts. It’s a good looking chair.Comfort is OK. I wouldn’t want to use it all day, but it’s fine for my home desk. Height is the only adjustment. It raises and lowers without difficulty. I like the way it feels at its highest setting (I’m 5’ 11”). There is a little side-to-side play. The cushion is some sort of memory foam. I can feel it sculpting to my sitz bones. It’s not bad, but kind of an unusual feeling. I can imagine it wearing out in those spots. The mesh of the back rest is firm and supportive. Unfortunately, I can feel the top edge of the rest digging into my back, just below my shoulder blades, if I lean back. It’s better for sitting up straight. The wheels are basic carpet casters, but it rolls smoothly. It’s also lightweight, if you need to pick it up and move it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep in mind, there’s no arms and very lightweight.
reviews.reviewText: My last office chair had arms so I could grab ahold of the arm before I sat because this little guy will slide right away from you likkity split. Just have to remember to be more careful in my senior years. Very reasonable price for a comfy little chair. It’s adjustable up and down so I found my spot. Back is comfortable to sit at for awhile. The construction seems sturdy and it doesn’t wobble. Also, my cat loves it and I have to share.At first I really liked the fact that it was so lightweight, but I think that might have something to do with it slipping away from me so easily with just a tap. Could be a problem if you’re not ready for it. Might be better on a carpeted floor than a hardwood or tile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this chair. It’s the perfect height for my desk. I would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars KOLLIEE Armless Home Office Chair
reviews.reviewText: This office chair is quite comfy for its size, took all of 5-10 minutes to assemble and looks great. I left the wheels off so it can sit on carpet. It rotates easily and raises up and lowers without issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Backup Chair or for Guests
reviews.reviewText: This is a very comfortable office-style chair. It's super easy to put together with minimal effort but feels very secure and supportive. The up/down tab is nicely concealed under the chair so there is no risk of snagging or accidentally pushing it. It can hold my weight just fine (220 lbs) without loss of pressure or height decrease over time so far. The padding itself is very comfortable, and the mesh backing feels nice. There aren't arms and the recline isn't adjustable, but I feel like it is a very good balance still of support vs lean when you put your weight back on it. All in all, I wouldn't use it as an everyday/all-day chair, but I do think it's great for guests or a back-up chair if ever needed. Would still recommend for sure. Great quality for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: With its mesh design, it provides excellent back support, and the swivel feature adds convenience.this office Chair is a compact and ergonomic solution for my comfortable workspace.
